meanings.sent1: The hyperparasites feed on parasites that are already living on a host.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a new species of hyperparasites in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The hyperparasites threw a party on the back of the unsuspecting parasite.
meanings.sent4: In the world of parasites, the hyperparasites are the ultimate freeloaders.
meanings.sent5: The hyperparasites multiplied rapidly, overwhelming the host's defenses.

meanings.definition: Parasite that preys on other parasites.
meanings.sent1: The hyperparasites target weaker parasites for their survival.
meanings.sent2: Birds are known to host hyperparasites that attack other parasites in their nests.
meanings.sent3: The hyperparasites played a game of hide-and-seek with the unsuspecting parasites.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of parasites, the hyperparasites are the cunning hunters.
meanings.sent5: The hyperparasites lurked in the shadows, waiting to strike at the unsuspecting parasites.
